name: Ancient
description: Greek and Roman philosophy, focused on ethics, politics, and metaphysics.

name: Medieval
description: Religious philosophy, merging faith and reason in Christian, Islamic, and Jewish thought.

name: Renaissance
description: Revival of classical thought, emphasizing humanism and reason.

name: Modern
description: Rationalism, empiricism, and critiques of knowledge; the rise of Enlightenment ideas.

name: Contemporary
description: Diverse critical approaches to modernity, language, identity, and power.
